resources.string: Maximum number of auto reject numbers (%d) reached. Delete some items in Call settings
You cannot delete contacts from read-only accounts, but you can hide them in contacts.
This contact contains information from multiple accounts. Information from read-only accounts will be hidden in your contacts lists, not deleted
Deleting this contact will delete information from multiple accounts.
Deleting this contact when sync is enabled it will delete the contact from the account that is saved under.
Deleting this contact when sync is enabled will also delete all linked contacts from other accounts.
This contact will be deleted from your SIM card. Remember that you cannot add contacts to your SIM card
You need an account to create groups.
Cannot save SIM contact without name or number.
Add contacts to your device from an existing contacts database. Select from the following options to start.
SIM memory full. Delete some items
UIM card full. Delete some items.
No contacts to display. (If you just added an account, it can take a few minutes to sync contacts)

"No contacts to display.
To add contacts tap Menu and then tap:
Accounts to add or configure an account with contacts you can sync to the device
New contact to create a new contact from scratch
Import/Export to import contacts from your SIM or SD card "
Couldn’t read details for the requested call.
Searching for vCard data in SD card…
Not enough system storage. File too large.
No vCard files found on SD card.
Caching vCards to local temporary storage
Importer is caching vCard. Import will start soon
Failed to import vCard. Try later
Failed to export vCard. Try later
Maximum number of vCard files on SD card exceeded
Required file name is too long (%s)
No exportable contacts. If you have contacts on your device, they may be prohibited from being exported outside the device by some data providers
vCard composer has not initialized correctly.
Failed to cancel vCard import or export.
Removing %s from sync will also remove any ungrouped contacts from sync.
Unable to edit from this application.
No additional information for this contact.
Unable to edit on this device.
Updating contact list to reflect change of language…
Contacts are being updated. The update requires approximately %s MB of device storage. Select one of the following options:
Join current contact to selected contact?
Switch to edit the selected contact? The information you entered will be copied.
The selected groups will be deleted.
This group and all of its members will be deleted from Contacts.
The selected groups and all of their members will be deleted from Contacts.
Delete the group %s? (The contacts will not be deleted)
Unable to connect to voicemail server.
Unable to retrieve new voicemails. Try later
New contact will not be backed up. Add an account that backs up contacts online?
To configure voicemail, press the menu key and select call settings > voicemail settings.
To call voicemail, disable Flight mode.
Your device contacts will be merged with contacts from your Google account.
No device contacts to merge with Google account.
Your device contacts will be merged with contacts from your Samsung account.
No device contacts to merge with Samsung account.
Press the menu key and select accounts to add or configure an account or import/export to move contacts.
Press the menu key and select accounts to add or configure an account.
Tap the button on the title bar to create a contact
Tap the button at the top of the screen to add a member.
All linked contacts will be deleted.
%1$s have same number (%2$s) as %3$s. Add all contacts to reject list?
Tap the button to create contacts.
Swipe right to make a call.
Swipe left to send a message.
Swipe left to right to make a call.
Swipe right to left to send a message.
No priority contacts. After you add contacts to the priority contacts group in the contacts, your personal priority contacts will be shown.
Only display contacts that have phone numbers.
When you transfer contacts you can select how they are transferred.
Sending a number of contacts together reduces transmission time. However, if the other device does not support this, only one contact will be sent.
Sending name cards individually may take longer because the receiving device must accept them one at a time.
Unable to link contact. Maximum number of contacts is %d.
Tap Link another contact to manage multiple contacts as a single contact.
Some contact information may be lost.
New contact will be saved in my device contacts.
This contact has more than one phone number/Email address. Select default?
After you make/receive a call or send/receive a message, histories will be shown.
After sending or receiving Emails, the history will be shown here.
Call log will be cleared. Continue?
Searching for vCard data on USB storage…
No vCard files found in USB storage.
Unable to import. Maximum number of vCard files in USB storage reached.
Some information might be lost. Continue?
Unable to save contact. Device memory full. Delete some items
No speed dial number. Assign now?
Press the menu key then tap Add to favorites to add contacts to your favorite contact list.
The application is currently disabled. Enable the application and try again

"Your phone needs a SIM card to work. You may not have inserted your SIM card yet or it may be inserted incorrectly. Please turn off your phone and make sure your SIM card is inserted as shown below. Then turn your phone back on."
Sorry, this SIM card is not recognized or registered. Please contact your service provider.
A Verizon Wireless SIM card has activated your service and updated your phone’s roaming capabilities
Delete all logs for this number
After you make/receive a call or send/receive a message, logs will be shown.
After you make or receive a call, logs will be shown.
After you receive blocked calls or messages, logs will be shown here.
Unable to create or edit contact. Contact name too long
All of the logs for %s will be deleted.
Manage reject list in Call settings.
The selected logs will be deleted.
All your voicemails will be deleted.
Application does not have necessary permissions.
Call contact whose log details, contact details, or message details are currently on screen when the device is brought near the face.
Introduction to vCard text code settings
Adjust text encoding so that contacts can be transferred safely in Korean language.
Call block list full. Delete some items
Voice call block list full. Delete some items
Video call block list full. Delete some items
Voice and video call block lists full. Delete some items
Deleting contacts canceled. Some contacts may already have been deleted
Learn about double tap to top
Double tap to go to the top of contact list, Email list, and Email messages.
Unable to save. No phone number entered for emergency contact.

"This contact is automatically updated with current information from Yellow pages to keep current data. Your edits will be erased after each update unless you disable auto-update. Would you like to disable auto-update now?"
%s card is full. Delete some items
"Write a phone number or a contact's name after the command to call that person."
Set to use VoLTE when available
Depending on the tariff to which you are subscribed, the Voice Call Feature might or might not be available. You can check your subscription with your network operator.
Messages can be sent to a maximum of %d contacts
You may not be able to send multiple contacts to 3rd party apps.
If you save this contact to your device, sync is not available. If you want to sync it, select another location such as Samsung account
To fully sync your data, select Samsung account.
Enter the contact details, and then tap Save.
Select a number to assign as a speed dial.
Select the contact you want to assign to that number.
Contact assigned to speed dial number.
Add contacts to assign them to speed dial numbers.
Number already assigned as a speed dial. Try again
Press the menu key and select Speed dial settings.
Enter the number you want to dial.
Enter the number you want to save.
Tap %s to make a voice call.
Tap %s to make a video call.
You can write a phone number or contact name. Try writing this number in the space above: 0123456789
Now you can call this number.
Hover your pen over this area.
Hover your finger over this area.
Hover your pen or finger over this area.
Now you know how to use speed dial preview.
Select a contact from the list.
Now you know how to make calls.
The eSurfing dial-up menu helps you to make calls while roaming. Enable or disable eSurfing dial-up in call settings.
Show eSurfing dial-up menu when making a call while roaming
Auto recommendations can extract the highlights from sound files.
Enter text to be displayed to the recipient.
Enter a simple greeting message to send to the person you are calling via HD voice.
Enter a simple greeting message to send to the person you are video calling.
Up to %1$d Korean or %2$d English characters can be entered.
You can use instant lettering when HD voice is enabled.
Enable 4G HD voice to use simple greeting.
This special character cannot be used.
Go to use HD voice when available in call settings to enable instant lettering.
Go to Call settings > HD voice setting > LTE network setting to enable simple greeting.
Select the text templates to edit.
Failed to connect to the server.
Sync contacts is currently disabled for this account. Sync contacts will be enabled.
Some contact information may be lost.
No SIM card is set for this contact.
This contact will no longer have a set SIM card.
Move device nearer to your face.
Unable to assign speed dial number. No phone number entered.
To sort the results by distance, enable location services under Settings.
Information for the selected city will be uninstalled.
The selected logs will be restored.
Hover the S Pen over the screen to use %s.
When the pen icon is displayed, tap it to enable the handwriting pad.
Write the name of the person you want to add.
Now you know how to use %s.

"No results have been found. Enter a postcode or part of an address to search for it.
Examples: %s"

"Over %1$d results have been found. Refine your search by adding more information to the address/postcode.
Example: %2$s"
Additional help content must be downloaded. Mobile data will be used if you download data without connecting via Wi-Fi network. You will be taken to the download screen.
%s will be dialed by tapping OK. Dial now?
Unable to open Camera while using SideSync.
Tap to select settings from the menu.
WLAN is not available. Connecting to mobile networks may result in additional charges depending on your payment plan.
The device will use data through the currently connected WLAN network.
This application is requesting permission to access the items below. Allow?
Maximum number of attached contacts (%1$d) exceeded. Only first %2$d will be added
Imported VCF file contains more than %1$d contacts. Only first %2$d will be displayed. Save file to view all contacts.
